question:
Jamal got three monthly electric bills over the course of three months. If his average monthly bill over these three months was $44 more than the median bill, and the sum of the largest and the smallest bills was $412, what was the total amount of the three electric bills Jamal got over the course of the three months?
(A) $456
(B) $552
(C) $600
(D) $824
(E) $1,000

Hide
